page.title: 12Local Garage, Rangeworthy
page.content: {There is a garage}in this area. It is in Bagstone. This sells petrol and diesel oil, services and repairs vehicles and is a base for a fleet of lorries. The garage is run by a staff of 3 people and there are also 15 lorry drivers. {The lorries}carry stone and gravel. They travel to Tytherington Quarry, Swindon, Bristol, Cheltenham and Gloucester. The journeys they make are always within 100 miles. Out of the 15 lorries, 1 lorry is a 4 wheeler and weighs 16 tons, 7 lorries are 6 wheelers and weigh 24 tons and 7 lorries are 8 wheelers and weigh 30 tons. {When asked about the changes}that were taking place in the business, the proprietor said that there were more and more lorries on the roads and they were getting bigger and heavier.
